original_text: And the mouth of it within the chapiter and above was a cubit: but the mouth thereof was round after the work of the base, a cubit and an half: and also upon the mouth of it were gravings with their borders, foursquare, not round.
korean_text: 그 받침 수레 위로 들이켜 높이가 한 규빗 되게 내민 것이 있고 그 면은 직경 한 규빗 반 되게 반원형으로 우묵하며 그 나머지 면에는 아로새긴 것이 있으며 그 내민 판들은 네모지고 둥글지 아니하며

sentences.original_text: And the mouth of it within the chapiter and above was a cubit:
sentences.korean_translation: 그것의 입은 기둥머리 안쪽과 위쪽에 한 규빗이었고

sentences.original_text: but the mouth thereof was round after the work of the base,
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그 입은 밑받침의 작품처럼 둥글었으며

sentences.original_text: and also upon the mouth of it were gravings with their borders,
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 그 입에는 그들의 테두리와 함께 새김이 있었으며
